CurrencyIsoCode.description: If multiple currencies are enabled, this field contains the currency ISO code associated with the record.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record indirectly, for example, through a list view or related record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, and LastReferenceDate is not null, the user accessed this record or list view indirectly.

Name.description: The name of the producer split arrangement line item record.

OwnerId.description: ID of the owner of this object.

ProducerId.description: The producer associated with the line item.

ProducerRelationType.description: Specifies the relationship of producer with the brokerage.

ProducerRole.description: The role of the producer associated with the line item.

ProducerSplitArrangementId.description: The parent producer split arrangement associated with the line item.

ShouldReceiveRoundedAmount.description: Indicates whether the producer receives a rounded value from the split amount.

SplitAmount.description: The amount that the producer gets paid for the split.

SplitPercentage.description: The commission percentage associated with the split.

SseqProducerSplitArngId.description: The subsequent producer split arrangement associated with the line item.
